name: Global navigation satellite system (GNSS)
description: A Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) signal controlled clock, which receives a signal that comes from the atomic clock of a GNSS constellation of satellites.

name: inapplicable
description: None of the codes in the table are applicable in the context of this particular observation.

name: Manual comparison
description: A regular procedure of manual comparison with a reference clock

name: Radio clock
description: A radio controlled clock, which receives a radio signal that comes from a reference/atomic clock.

name: Time server (internet based)
description: A server computer that reads the actual time from a reference/atomic clock and distributes this information to its clients using a computer network. The time server may be a local network time server or an internet time server.
